name: Wonderful Hand
detailed_description:
People are stacks of blocks. Knock down all the bad guys, don’t get shot, and get to the flag in time. Do this by cunningly and skilfully manipulating the physical environment with your wonderful (slightly clumsy) hand.

Each level has a bronze, silver, and gold time. Get faster times to earn more 'magic cubes' and unlock more levels. Each level can be played many times, as you experiment with different approaches and aim for better times.

This game has no repetitive, filler content. Each of the 30+ levels introduces something new and interesting into the game world.

short_description: People are stacks of blocks. Knock down all the bad guys, don’t get shot, and get to the flag in time. Do this by cunningly and skilfully manipulating the physical environment with your wonderful (slightly clumsy) hand.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mobile Intel 4 Series Express Chipset Family or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard. Touchpad supported, but mouse strongly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard. Touchpad supported, but mouse strongly recommended
